## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install test_thing in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure test_thing package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to test_thing
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/yannsay/test_thing):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/yannsay/test_thing.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/yannsay/test_thing)

``` sh
$ conda install -c yannsay test_thing
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/test_thing/)

``` sh
$ pip install test_thing
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/yannsay/test_thing)’s
[pages](https://yannsay.github.io/test_thing/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/yannsay/test_thing) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/test_thing/) respectively.
